original_title: Lang Lang:  At The Royal Albert Hall
overview: In November 2013 Lang Lang returned to London's legendary Royal Albert Hall for two sold-out recitals â€“ finishing a celebrated Mozart und Chopin programme with no fewer than eight encores. This 120-minute film captures the complete recital and offers an opportunity to relive an unforgettable concert experience.
tagline: Lang Lang at the Royal Albert Hall
title: Lang Lang at the Royal Albert Hall
